multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been experiencing itching all over my body for the past year.
Have any skin rashes or changes accompanied the itching?
Yes, I have linear urticaria on my upper back that appears after gentle scratching.
Have you noticed any worsening of your symptoms in specific situations or after certain activities?
The itching gets worse around areas where my clothing is tight, and it happens within a few minutes of contact.
Do you have any known allergies or previous allergic reactions?
No, I don't have any history of skin conditions or known allergies.
Has anyone in your family experienced similar symptoms or any other skin-related issues?
I'm sorry, but I don't have any information on my family's medical history regarding similar symptoms or skin-related issues.
Are you currently taking any medications or have you recently started any new ones?
I am not taking any medications other than multivitamins.
**Final Diagnosis:** Dermatographia (skin writing)
